publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5404 Murdo Fraser: Special Praise for Special Treatsâ€”That the Parliament praises the work of the Special Treats charity based in Rattray, Perthshire; recognises that Special Treats organises a number of visits and events for the people of Rattray and District, which allows people in Rattray and the surrounding area to have greater community interaction and involvement; believes that the charity has created a stronger community spirit, and thanks all the volunteers for their dedication, commitment and time.
